definition: Hakodate, main port of south Hokkaidō 北海道[Bei3 hai3 dao4], Japan
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: A city of southwest Hokkaido, Japan, on Tsugaru Strait.
sentences.chinese: 函館日本北海道西南部一城市，位於津輕海峽邊。

sentences.english: You are a fuel engineer assigned to Hakodate-maru.
sentences.chinese: 你是函館號上的核燃料分配員。

sentences.english: Nagisatei is situated on the seaside of Hakodate Yunokawa Onsen, historical hot-spring resort.
sentences.chinese: 坐落在函館湯之川溫泉海濱，歷史悠久的溫泉。

definition: Miyazaki prefecture in east Kyūshū 九州, Japan
Asakusa, district of Tokyo with an atmosphere of old Japan, famous for the 7th century Buddhist temple, Sensō-ji
Matsushima (name)/Matsushima town and national park in Miyagi prefecture, Japan

Kōbe, major Japanese port near Ōsaka
tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
Hyōgo prefecture in the midwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
